DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: AQUINO, T. M.;DE AQUINO, THOMAZ MARTINS;MARTINS, THOMAZ

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Mestre em Estratйgia Empresarial pela EAESP FGV (com pesquisa na linha de empreendedorismo) e Graduado em Economia Empresarial e Controladoria pela Universidade de Sгo Paulo (USP). Entre 2015 e 2017 foi membro do grupo de pesquisa Business Process Innovation, vinculado a Universidade de Sгo Paulo (USP). Entre 2018 e 2021 foi Diretor Executivo da aceleradora de startups FGV Ventures, onde criou a metodologia de aceleraзгo de startups da FGV EAESP e responsбvel pela aceleraзгo de mais de 40 startups. Atualmente й Professor do Insper e o Coordenador do Centro de Empreendedorismo da instituiзгo, onde apoia o desenvolvimento de novos cursos ligados a inovaзгo e empreendedorismo na graduaзгo, pуs e educaзгo executiva, promove atividades de suporte para startups e deeptechs, alйm de gerir a interface do Insper com grupos de investimento anjo, com o nъcleo de pesquisa em empreendedorismo e agentes externos. Por fim, й membro do conselho do Insper Angels, membro do comitк de seleзгo do FEA Angels, e investidor anjo das startups Fluke (telecom), Baduk (fintech) e Umatch (dating).
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: I hold a Master's degree in Business Strategy from EAESP FGV (with research in the entrepreneurship field) and a Bachelor's degree in Business Economics and Controllership from the University of Sгo Paulo (USP).Between 2015 and 2017, I was a member of the Business Process Innovation research group affiliated with the University of Sгo Paulo (USP). From 2018 to 2021, I served as the Executive Director of the startup accelerator FGV Ventures, where I developed the startup acceleration methodology for FGV EAESP and was responsible for accelerating over 40 startups.Currently, I am a Professor at Insper and the Coordinator of the institution's Center for Entrepreneurship. In this role, I support the development of new courses related to innovation and entrepreneurship in undergraduate, postgraduate, and executive education programs. I also facilitate activities to support startups and deeptechs, in addition to managing Insper's interactions with angel investment groups, the entrepreneurship research center, and external stakeholders.Lastly, I am a member of the Insper Angels advisory board, a member of the selection committee for FEA Angels, and an angel investor in the startups Fluke (telecom), Baduk (fintech), and Umatch (dating).
